content: How are alias codeSystem URI to be handled in codeSystem resource? I noticed an accidental publication of an IHE FormatCode codeSystem that had a canonical URI (.url) that we don't want to use, but would like to be able to recognize it historically.
do I just put it into the new CodeSystem as a .identifier ?
We do need to make this clear and consistent. @Rob Hausam @Ted Klein @Carol Macumber No one is commenting because we're not sure...
